value.name: Little boy whose twin donated his own cells as he fought leukaemia died before having 'last chance' treatment
value.description: He died on October 27, 2019 at Royal Manchester Children's Hospital. His heartbroken parents Jayne and Jason Whittle, of Croston, Lancashire, told an inquest in Manchester Coroners' Court Reuben ...

value.name: LFC fan, 7, who 'lived for football' died weeks before 'life-saving treatment' could take place
value.description: A seven-year-old Liverpool FC superfan died before he could have had a new life-saving treatment, an inquest heard. Little Reuben Whittle, who loved the Reds so much he was buried in his special ...
